head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KOWALEWSKI, RONALD T.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KOWALEWSKI, RONALD T.

block.p: KOWALEWSKI-Ronald T., 56. Of Trenton, N.J., passed away April 12. Beloved husband of Maire, cherished father of Christine and Kathryn, dear brother of Judith. Funeral service is on Thursday at 11 A.M., Saul Colonial Home, 3795 Nottingham Way, Hamilton Square, New Jersey. Relatives and friends may call on Wednesday from 6-9 PM at the Colonial Home.

KOWALEWSKI-Ronald T., 56. Of Trenton, N.J., passed away April 12. Beloved husband of Maire, cherished father of Christine and Kathryn, dear brother of Judith. Funeral service is on Thursday at 11 A.M., Saul Colonial Home, 3795 Nottingham Way, Hamilton Square, New Jersey. Relatives and friends may call on Wednesday from 6-9 PM at the Colonial Home.
